lastbreath.configuration.title: LastBreath Configs
lastbreath.config.rescue_duration: Duration in millisecond for the rescue action
lastbreath.config.bleeding_duration: Duration in second for the bleeding until death (-1 means no bleeding)
lastbreath.config.dying_health: Health value when a player enters dying state
lastbreath.config.dying_max_health: Max health when a player is dying state
lastbreath.config.rescue_health: Health value after a player is rescued
lastbreath.config.dying_speed: Speed when a player is dying
